motivate.row2: For what you love the most.

company.about: Efthymiou Athanasios - Insurance Group was founded in 1991 with the purpose of making your life easier by providing insurance services.
company.header: What makes us special and what is your gain.

item2.row1: We are collaborating with companies that provide insurance services
item2.row2: and the majority of them enlist on the 'Fortune 500' with

item3.row1: Our clients trust us because we support them in time of need.
item3.row2: We attend their finnancial needs, we protect their fortune and their
item3.row3: company, and we help them plan for the future.

company.item4: We provide innovative and concluded services, based on your needs.

content.dot1: Inner hospital care in private medical clinics and public hospitals.
content.dot2: Outer hospital care (examination and doctor services).

content.dot3: Investments in Mutual Funds (low, medium and high risk).

content.dot1: Disability pension (caused by sickness or accident).

content.dot2: Home loan insurance (also for bank contracts).
content.dot3: Coverage of family and pet liability.

content.dot1: Professional Liability Coverage (Doctors, Lawyers, Accountants, Electricians, Engineers, etc.).
content.dot2: Business Liability Coverage (Cafes, Confectioneries, Hotels, Tutoring, Pharmacies, Hairdressers, construction of buildings, etc.).

content.dot1: Private use Vehicle Insurance, Agricultural, Tractors, Two-wheelers etc.
Pleasure Boat, Sailing boat, Professional boat Insurance.

content.dot2: Legal protection of the company and the entrepreneur.
content.dot3: Legal Protection of professionals (Doctors, Accountants, etc.).
content.dot4: Legal protection of vehicle and driver.
content.dot6: Legal Protection of real estate leasing.
content.dot7: Legal Protection of apartment building management.

content.dot1: Mediation for the installation of photovoltaics.
content.dot2: Mediation for recidence or buisness electricity supply.
content.dot3: Mediation for residence or buisness gas supply.
